clues.clue: In 1866 this large island became politically united with British Columbia

Divided between 2 countries, it's the largest island in the Pacific

dream

ugly

hooray, aw, eek, rats

very

in

Mexico, 1940:
Looks like this former No. 2 man under Lenin in Russia got whacked, literally

Instead of counting atoms, chemists simplify with the unit called a mole or this scientist's number

final_jeopardy.clue: As there was another album by that title, this classic from 1973 was at one point going to be called "Eclipse"
